main_definition: Venues refer to places where events, performances, or gatherings take place.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Places for hosting conferences and meetings
meanings_and_examples.example: The convention center served as a venue for the annual business conference.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Facilities where performances or events occur
meanings_and_examples.example: The local theatre was an excellent venue for community plays and concerts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Places used to sell products directly to consumers
meanings_and_examples.example: Street markets often serve as venues for vendors selling handmade crafts and food items.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Areas designated for sporting events or competitions
meanings_and_examples.example: The stadium was the main venue for hosting the regional football championship.
